Purchase Method:: 69 kV dead-tank circuit breaker, with three group-operated interrupting contacts contained in separate tanks, internally insulated with SF6 gas, constituting a pole or phase of the three-phase, three-pole, breaker. Breaker poles are to be mounted on a common frame, with polymer-housed bushings, and a common stored energy operating drive mechanism. See Technical Specifications
